description: This file is an ESLint configuration file written in ES module syntax. It imports modules to assist in extending ESLint configurations, specifically for Next.js core web vitals and TypeScript.

methods.name: __filename
methods.description: A constant holding the filename derived from the module URL.

methods.name: __dirname
methods.description: A constant holding the directory name of the current module.

methods.name: compat
methods.description: An instance of FlatCompat used to manage extended ESLint configurations.
